snippet: In the 2015 postseason, Murphy has hit five homers in seven games, and all of the blasts have come off elite pitchers.
abstract: New York Mets infielder Daniel Murphy has hit five home runs in seven 2015 postseason games, despite having only hit 14 in regular season; run of big hits is likely to affect his prospects when he becomes free agent after this season.
lead_paragraph: In the 2015 postseason, Murphy has hit five homers in seven games, and all of the blasts have come off elite pitchers.

headline.main: Mets Savor Daniel Murphy’s Home-Run Streak
